table.name: monConnection

messages.SQL0551N: Security issue. Please install "Monitoring Switches/Security" in Tools -> Installed Components

table.inlinequery: SELECT * from TABLE(MON_GET_CONNECTION(cast(NULL as bigint), -2)) AS t

messages.SQL0551N: Security issue. Please install "Monitoring Switches/Security" in Tools -> Installed Components

table.description: You can use this view to monitor DB2 connection metrics. The view retrieves information using a monitor table function introduced in DB2 9.7. Each row displays metrics for a single DB2 connection returned by the MON_GET_CONNECTION table function. This view is not available for databases prior to DB2 9.7.

column.name: TOTAL_ROUTINE_USER_CODE_PROC_TIME
